Description:
To be successful you will need to meet the following:Highschool Graduate/Bachelor’s Degree holder with proven marketing experience.
Minimum 2 – 3 years’ relevant experience. Only candidates with experience in digital photography industry would be considered.
Experience in marketing tools and social media platform.
Creative and knowledgeable in Photography and Videography.
Excellent written and oral communication skills in English.
Self-starter, highly motivated and innovative.
Applicants should be available for face-to-face interviews in the location mentioned above.Job Details
